title: 100 Piece Elegant White Disposable Plastic Plates & Plastic Silverware Set Heavyweight Place Setting | Service for 20 Guests Includes 20 Dinner Plates 20 Dessert Plates 20 Forks 20 Spoons 20 Knives
features: ⭐️ HIGH-CLASS DISPOSABLE DINNERWARE SET – These beautiful, white plastic dishes and eating utensils feature an elegant finish that highlights our silverware for a bold, original touch. Guests are sure to enjoy every bite with these plates and silverware.

⭐️ COMPLETE PARTY AND EVENT PLACEMENTS – Each order of the bulk white party plates includes 20 dinner plates, 20 dessert plates, 20 forks, 20 knives, and 20 spoons to service a large family, gathering of friends, or a smaller professional or corporate event.

⭐️ STUNNING TEXTURED ADORNMENTS – High end looks blend with luxurious style featuring style edges for classic sophistication while the cutlery is crafted with textured handles to give them an original look and more non-slip control.

⭐️ LAVISH AND FORMAL VERSATILITY – These fine plates & overall luxurious nice disposable dinnerware makes the perfect addition to a birthday party, celebrating holidays with style, adding class to a wedding or shower, or making mealtime more fun.

⭐️ DISPOSABLE AND RECYCLABLE CONVENIENCE – When the party is over and you’re ready to clean up, we’ve made it even easier. Because these plates and utensils are made with BPA-free, food-grade safe plastic, they’re recyclable, too! Your smart solution for fine disposable plates!
description: Are you looking for high-quality disposable partyware & silverware that adds an air of sophistication and elegance? Do you love the idea of premium matching plates, forks, spoons & knives? Well, this 100-piece set by Posh Setting is it, it’s great for any event or special occasion. Add a fine touch of class to your events with this luxury 100-piece White plastic plates and plastic silverware set. Disposable luxury Parties and special events are awesome but planning them... not so much! Especially when you want to make a classy & elegant party decoration on budget. The good news is that we made this part easy for you – our exquisite set of dinnerware and plates stands out and impressively catches the eye of guests. Refined gorgeousness The 20 dinner plates, 20 dessert plates, 20 forks, 20 knives, and 20 spoons are sure to help you add practical sophistication and style in your party decoration. Perfect to service a large family, gathering of friends, or a smaller professional or corporate event. Rejoice with a sense of style & elegance. By Posh Setting
